mapper.update:
update laundry
DATE = #{DATE,jdbcType=DATE},
ROOM_NUM = #{ROOM_NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GUEST_ID = #{GUEST_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GUEST_NAME = #{GUEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOTHES = #{CLOTHES,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER = #{OTHER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNT = #{COUNT,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{TOTAL_PRICE,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OCCUR_TIME = #{OCCUR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMPORT_TIME = #{IMPORT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDIT_TIME = #{EDIT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update laundry set DATE = #{DATE,jdbcType=DATE}, ROOM_NUM = #{ROOM_NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUEST_ID = #{GUEST_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GUEST_NAME = #{GUEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOTHES = #{CLOTHES,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHER = #{OTHER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNT = #{COUNT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{TOTAL_PRICE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OCCUR_TIME = #{OCCUR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMPORT_TIME = #{IMPORT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDIT_TIME = #{EDIT_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from laundry where ROOM_NUM like CONCAT('%', #{RN}, '%') and DATE = #{DATE}
select * from laundry where ROOM_NUM like CONCAT('%', #{RN}, '%') and DATE = #{DATE}
select * from laundry where ROOM_NUM = #{RN} and GUEST_ID = #{GID} and DATE = #{DATE}
